name: POD Product Creator - Bulk Mockup Generator

parameters.content:
## ðŸ“¦ POD Product Creator

**What this workflow does:**
Automatically creates product mockups for every design Ã— product combination (t-shirt, mug, poster, etc.)

**Requirements:**
- SudoMock API key ([Get free tier](https://sudomock.com))
- Google Drive access
- PSD mockup templates uploaded to SudoMock
- Design files in Google Drive folder

**Time Saved:**
100 designs Ã— 10 products = 1000 mockups
Manual: ~100 hours â†’ Automated: ~2 hours

nodes.name: Schedule Daily
nodes.notes: Run daily to check for new designs

nodes.name: Get New Designs
nodes.notes: Fetch new design files from Google Drive folder

nodes.name: Get Product Templates
nodes.notes: Get all uploaded PSD mockup templates (t-shirt, mug, poster, etc.)

nodes.name: Create DesignÃ—Product Matrix
nodes.notes: Create all combinations: design1Ã—tshirt, design1Ã—mug, design2Ã—tshirt, etc.

parameters.content:
## ðŸ”„ Sequential Processing

**How it works:**
1. Creates design Ã— product matrix (e.g., 10 designs Ã— 5 products = 50 combos)
2. Processes ONE combination at a time (prevents rate limits)
3. Each render takes ~1 second
4. Collects results and loops back

**Example:** 50 mockups = ~50 seconds sequential

**Why sequential?**
Free tier allows 1 parallel render. Upgrade to process faster:
- Starter: 3 parallel (~17 sec for 50)
- Pro: 10 parallel (~5 sec for 50)
- Scale: 25 parallel (~2 sec for 50)

nodes.name: Loop Through Combinations
nodes.notes: Process one combination at a time to avoid rate limits

nodes.name: Render Product Mockup
nodes.notes: Generate high-quality mockup for this designÃ—product

nodes.name: Generate CSV Export
nodes.notes: Create CSV for bulk upload to Printful/Printify

parameters.content:
## ðŸ“Š Output & Integration

**What you get:**
- CSV file with all mockup URLs
- Organized by design name
- Ready for Printful/Printify bulk upload

**CSV format:**
```
Design Name, Product Type, Mockup URL, Status
Flower-01, TShirt, https://..., SUCCESS
Flower-01, Mug, https://..., SUCCESS
```

**Next steps:**
1. Download CSV from Google Drive
2. Import to Printful/Printify
3. Auto-create product listings
